amendment.description: To provide funding for the rural emergency medical service training and equipment assistance program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1642 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1642 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11324) To provide funding for the rural emergency medical service training and equipment assistance program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1642 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1642 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 1542.
